resources.string:
SLIDE

Each paragraph
is a slide

This is a slide
.
with a blank line

Tap on the preview
to start the presentation

Swipe left or right on the preview
to go to another slide

You may also pick
a color scheme in the menu

Done!

UML

You can also add UML!

Enable PlantUML in the menu

@startuml
Bob->Alice : hello
@enduml

@startuml nw 50%
class Foo
.
class Bar
@enduml
.
#Hello
.
@startuml se 50%
class Baz
@enduml

Check out the PlantUML docs in the menu

MathJax

Use @startmath and @endmath

@startmath
f(x) = ax^2 + bx +c
@endmath

The layout options apply as well!

@startmath se 75%
f(x) = ax^2+bx+c=0
@endmath

Want to create more presentations?
\First change the text of this presentation

Then swipe right on the editor to
create a new presentation

Swipe left to go back
All data is auto-saved :)

You can do more stuff

Such as setting templates

Just check out the menu

Each presentation has its own settings

Don't forget to export
to PDF and share
Note: a PlantUML server is used to create the diagram. The textual data is sent via internet to the configured URL. For confidential information, use a trusted URL with HTTPS.
The configured text below is inserted at the beginning of every UML diagram.
The configured text below is inserted at the end of every UML diagram.
The configured text below is inserted at the beginning of every slide.
The configured text below is inserted at the end of every slide.
Export completed. Tap to open PDF.
